description.value: Once per game session, character can make a +0 Tech-Use Test as a Full Action to improve one functioning piece of personal equipment. If successful, the chosen item becomes one Craftsmanship Higher, +1 per three Degrees of Success, until the end of the game session. (max Best Craftsmanship)
